question: Melinda looked out of her window one night and saw a very bright star just over the top of a tree. Late that night she looked out and the star was gone. Which BEST explains what happened?
candidate_answers: (A) Earth turns so the stars seem to move. (B) Some stars only shine for a few hours each night. (C) The star must have burned up. (D) Some stars move faster than others.
answer: Some stars only shine for a few hours each night.
label: B
